title: SF Street History
desc: Explore the rich history of San Francisco street names and landmarks with maps, locations and history.

title: Base64 Image Encoder
desc: Simple base64 image encoder. Give it a URL and get back the image in base64 goodness.

title: Invoice Generator
desc: A quick and easy invoice generator. Invoices can be saved and exported and you can generate PDF's.  Great for those "one-time" jobs.

title: Album Explorer
desc: Cool little album explorer idea I've been toying with.  You can add albums by name using the form at the top but be warned: there is no error handling for misspelled or missing album names. Click on an album to open it up and to see more information about the album such as track titles, history, other albums by the band and similar albums. Click an album anywhere to add it to your carousel. DOES NOT SAVE YOUR ADDITIONS. This is just a proof of concept.

title: Booze Cluez
desc: App to track an attempt to have one drink at every bar in San Francisco.

title: Thesaurus
desc: World's simplest thesaurus without ads and nothing to sell.
